title: Ebro In The Morning - Let's Talk About Drugs + Do We Do White Ish Wednesday In Black History Month?
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 2/9/2022.

Ebro, Rosenberg, Laura Stylez, and the crew are in the studio talking about the backlash against harm reduction programs, white ish Wednesday is back, and Rosenberg is begging that you leave Nelly alone (1:30)

Get excited for our new segment Black Facts and the also the gurus help solve your problems. All that and more on Ebro In The Morning! 

Click here to learn about the Hot 97 - Securing the Future initiative. 

Please like and subscribe to Ebro In The Morning.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
